## 動作確認

- [ ] backend: `cd backend && uv run ruff check app`
- [ ] backend: `cd backend && uv run python -m compileall app`
- [ ] frontend: `cd frontend && npm run lint`
- [ ] frontend: `cd frontend && npm run build`
